channel.title: Frame help
channel.description: do somebody now which frame there come only varrock and edgeville

item.title: Frame help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

OHHHHH ! Okay.

First we gotta declare some stoof.

Open player.java and declare:

public int randomEffect;

Then open client.java and declare:

public void teleportEffect1() { randomEffect = 1; sendQuest("Which Teleport?", 2470); sendQuest("Varrock", 2471); sendQuest("Edgeville", 2472); sendQuest("", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }

Okay, now that we are done declaring we can open up clickingmost.java, and under your teleport case, add this:

c.teleportEffect1();

That makes it so the frame will popup and show the text, now we have to make the text teleport you. Keep clickingmost open, and under “case 9167:” add this:

if(c.randomEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(####, @@@@, 0);

Replace

with AbsX Coords for Varrock

@@@@ with absY coords for varrock

now Search up: “case 9168:” and under that add:

if(c.randomEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(####, @@@@, 0);

= AbsX Coords for edgeville

@@@@ = AbsY Coords for edgeville

Then save, compile, whatever, and when you log in, click the teleport that you put this under, and options should pop up.

If you can’t follow this, I’m sorry, but you need more experience.

Read full topic
